name: Tank Killer Gun
description:
Be careful, be fast, be hero. You are the Tank Destroyer. You have anti aircraft gun. Use the antiaircraft weapon and kill them all. Best Tank Destroyer game on 2017
You should destroy the tank with anti-aircraft. The tank fleet is firing mercilessly, you must fight to save the city and shoot at the tanks.

The tanks are very powerful, but your weapon is very powerful. Fire steadily, the city has returned to the battlefield. You must destroy all tanks for your people's safety.

The enemy is constantly tanking to capture the military zone. Destroy all the tanks and defeat the enemy to stop them.

You are the last hope for city.

Realistic anti-aircraft
Realistic anti-aircraft gun
Realistic tanks
Realistic tank physics and tank tanks
Realistic sounds
The sections that get harder as you go
publishers: BROBABIL IC VE DIS TICARET LTD STI
